title: Provides reusable functionality for R and CI/CD
text: CI/CD jobs defined .github/workflows directory form GitHub Action workflows. can modified per requirements, designed implemented follow best practices ensure highest quality standards package. üëâ information workflows, please refer Workflows documentation.

title: What do these workflows do?
text: Runs devtools::check() devtools::test() R package inside checked repository.

title: What do these workflows do?
text: Runs tests installed package, generates qc documentation uploads artifact later consumption.

title: What do these workflows do?
text: Runs lintr repo linting settings specified container image, except overriden repository-specific .lintr.R configuration file.

title: What do these workflows do?
text: Generates man/*.Rd documentation roxygen. Renders pkgdown website uploads Github Pages.

title: What do these workflows do?
text: Checks version numbers NEWS.md DESCRIPTION match. Checks version numbers don‚Äôt fourth component (major.minor.patch.dev) PRs targeting main.

title: What do these workflows do?
text: Builds reusable workflow called repositories. Example configuration main branch:
code: --- name: Checks üß©  on:   pull_request:     types:       - opened       - synchronize       - reopened       - ready_for_review     branches:       - main   push:     branches:       - main   workflow_dispatch:  jobs:   check-test:     name: Check üì¶     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/check.yml@main    lintr:     name: Lintr üîç     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/lintr.yml@main     with:       lintr_error_on_lint: true    pkgdown:     name: Pkgdown üìñ     uses: boehringer-ingelheim/dv.templates/.github/workflows/pkgdown.yml@main
